Labjack T7¶

class labjackT7.LabJack(device='ANY', connection='ANY', devid='ANY', orange=10, arange=10)¶

Bases: labAPI.archetypes.Parallel.ProcessHandler

Args: int channel: 0, 2-5 are valid for the LabJack T7 float frequency float duty_cycle

spi_info()¶
spi_initialize(mode=3, block=0, CLK=0, CS=1, MOSI=2, MISO=3)¶

Args: int CS: the channel to use as chip select int CLK: the channel to use as the clock int MISO: the channel to use for input int MOSI: the channel to use for output int block: the labjack terminal block to use. block=0 uses FIO0-3, block=4 uses FIO4-7, etc

stream_DSP(input_channel, output_channel, dsp, scanRate=100000, targetRate=100)¶

Streams in on input_channel, performs signal processing on the PC, then streams out on output_channel

stream_in_out(input_channels, output_channel, scanRate, targetRate, stopped=False)¶
